title: Review: Specialized 2FO Roost Canvas Flat Pedal Shoe adds ultra casual option for SlipNot fans
content:
Specialized has released a more casual version of their most casual flat pedal mountain bike shoe, the 2FO Roost Canvas. Rocking the same super sticky, low rebound 3rd Gen SlipNot rubber seen on the original 2FO Roost, the Roost DH, and the Rime, the 2FO Roost Canvas is still a great performer on the trail

The post Review: Specialized 2FO Roost Canvas Flat Pedal Shoe adds ultra casual option for SlipNot fans appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
